title: Topic 005 Question 071
body: You have an Azure AD tenant that contains the users shown in the following table.
You need to ensure that the users cannot create app passwords. The solution must ensure that User1 can continue to use the Mail and Calendar app.
options: Assign User1 the Authentication Policy Administrator role.
Configure a multi-factor authentication (MFA) registration policy.
From multi-factor authentication, configure the service settings.
